description: This is a frontend HTML file that implements a web-based database visualizer interface. It contains layout, styles, and client-side JavaScript code to interactively browse databases, tables, and table data, including loading state management, error handling, and data rendering.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Triggers reloading of the database list with a spinning refresh button.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables, and loads tables from the server.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data rows and injects into the DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Prepares individual cell content, handling long text, nulls, and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
